title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 510.14 - Post-argument communications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 510.14 - Post-argument communications

State Regulations

Post-argument and post-submission
communications to the court concerning motions and appeals, in the form of
letters, memoranda or briefs, are not permitted and will be returned to the
sender, unless specifically requested or authorized by the Court of Appeals or
authorized, in writing, by the clerk of the Court of Appeals upon submission to
the clerk with a request that they be accepted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
510.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
